item.title: How to Install Hugo With Loveit Theme
item.author: Author
item.description: You can learn how to build hugo blog with loveit theme. With github action’s help you can auto deploy to github page Install Hugo Install theme and plugin 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 git init git remote add origin git@github.com:echowings/blogs.git git submodule add https://github.com/dillonzq/LoveIt.git themes/LoveIt git submodule add https://github.com/kaushalmodi/hugo-search-fuse-js.git themes/hugo-search-fuse-js git submodule add --force -b master git@github.com:echowings/echowings.github.io.git public 1 2 3 {{< mermaid >}} GRAPH LR; A-->B
